briefTitle: Linagliptin Add-on to Insulin Background Therapy
officialTitle: A Phase III, Randomised, Double-blind, Placebo-controlled, Parallel Group, Efficacy and Safety Study of Linagliptin, Administered Orally Once Daily, in Combination With Insulin Therapy for 24 Weeks in Chinese Type 2 Diabetes Mellitus Patients With Insufficient Glycaemic Control
summary: To evaluate the efficacy and safety of linagliptin compared to placebo when added on to insulin therapy alone or in combination with metformin in Chinese patients with type 2 diabetes mellitus with insufficient glycaemic control

primaryOutcome.measure: Percentage Change From Baseline in Glycosylated Haemoglobin A1c (HbA1c) After 24 Weeks of Treatment
